PackageOracle.name: DA_ELEC_ADDRESS
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ELEC_ADDRESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.50.995783000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,elec_address_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_txt IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_domain_nm IN VARCHAR2
,domain_root_cd IN VARCHAR2
,valid_elec_address_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,elec_address_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_txt IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_domain_nm IN VARCHAR2
,domain_root_cd IN VARCHAR2
,valid_elec_address_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,elec_address_id IN NUMBER
,elec_address_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_txt IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_domain_nm IN VARCHAR2
,domain_root_cd IN VARCHAR2
,valid_elec_address_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,elec_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_elec_address;

body.name: DA_ELEC_ADDRESS
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ELEC_ADDRESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.51.007412000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,elec_address_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_txt IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_domain_nm IN VARCHAR2
,domain_root_cd IN VARCHAR2
,valid_elec_address_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_elec_address.add(fx), parms=' || elec_address_subtype_cd || '|' || elec_address_txt || '|' || elec_address_domain_nm || '|' || domain_root_cd || '|' || valid_elec_address_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_elec_address a
(
a.elec_address_id
,a.elec_address_subtype_cd
,a.elec_address_txt
,a.elec_address_domain_nm
,a.domain_root_cd
,a.valid_elec_address_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_elec_address_id.NEXTVAL
,add.elec_address_subtype_cd
,add.elec_address_txt
,add.elec_address_domain_nm
,add.domain_root_cd
,add.valid_elec_address_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.elec_address_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_elec_address.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,elec_address_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_txt IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_domain_nm IN VARCHAR2
,domain_root_cd IN VARCHAR2
,valid_elec_address_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_elec_address.add, parms=' || elec_address_subtype_cd || '|' || elec_address_txt || '|' || elec_address_domain_nm || '|' || domain_root_cd || '|' || valid_elec_address_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_elec_address a
(
a.elec_address_id
,a.elec_address_subtype_cd
,a.elec_address_txt
,a.elec_address_domain_nm
,a.domain_root_cd
,a.valid_elec_address_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_elec_address_id.NEXTVAL
,add.elec_address_subtype_cd
,add.elec_address_txt
,add.elec_address_domain_nm
,add.domain_root_cd
,add.valid_elec_address_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_elec_address.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,elec_address_id IN NUMBER
,elec_address_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_txt IN VARCHAR2
,elec_address_domain_nm IN VARCHAR2
,domain_root_cd IN VARCHAR2
,valid_elec_address_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_elec_address.add, parms=' || elec_address_id || '|' || elec_address_subtype_cd || '|' || elec_address_txt || '|' || elec_address_domain_nm || '|' || domain_root_cd || '|' || valid_elec_address_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_elec_address a
(
a.elec_address_id
,a.elec_address_subtype_cd
,a.elec_address_txt
,a.elec_address_domain_nm
,a.domain_root_cd
,a.valid_elec_address_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.elec_address_id
,add.elec_address_subtype_cd
,add.elec_address_txt
,add.elec_address_domain_nm
,add.domain_root_cd
,add.valid_elec_address_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_elec_address.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,elec_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_elec_address.del, parms=' || elec_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_elec_address a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.elec_address_id = del.elec_address_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_elec_address.del');

END del;

END da_elec_address;
